@ Numse n @ diesiltork -

Seriously guys/gals, u wanna judge an entire nation based on a movie and it's rip quality? Have you both lost it completely?

May I suggest some classics of our culture? I am a big fan of Amitabh, so here goes - Lawaaris, Sholay, Chupke Chupke, Anand, Muqadar ka Sikander... there's a long list though

Then you can try Sarfarosh, Tere Naam, Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak, Andaaz Apna Apna...

Watch these, I seriously doubt if u can get DVDrips of some thru torrents, so u can search in a video store...

One thing u ppl gotta understand, Indian movies are mostly based on feelings of love, friendship n family... if u haven't grown up in a culture akin to ours, it will be difficult to understand our themes.

So, dear friends, no offense, but try to learn about a country before trying to slander it. If I continue on my laurels, TPB will probably delete my post because of the length..... :D

Peace be with you...... :)
